comment.author: 62187142@N00
comment._content: Cool that they were showing Rocky. Did you stay to watch? I wonder if the crowd knew the lines...IMA is on my list if Museums to see - i should be doing an Indiana tour sometime in the next couple of years (some of my people are from there).

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: I didn't - was dead tired from the flight, but I should have.  I grew up with that movie.  I did see the aftermath the next morning - the amphitheater had stuff everywhere.  Looked like total fun.  IMA is really awesome.  The galleries are great, the museum peeps are super.  -sb
